section.heading: Aged, blind, or disabled assistance—Medical care services—Earned income exemption

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.04 > Section 74.04.266 74.04.265 << 74.04.266 >> 74.04.280 PDF RCW 74.04.266 Aged, blind, or disabled assistance — Medical care services — Earned income exemption. In determining need for aged, blind, or disabled assistance, and medical care services, the department may by rule and regulation establish a monthly earned income exemption as provided for in RCW 74.08A.230 . [ 2023 c 418 s 8 ; 2011 1st sp.s. c 36 s 21 ; 2010 1st sp.s. c 8 s 21 ; 1977 ex.s. c 215 s 1 .] NOTES: Findings — Intent — 2011 1st sp.s. c 36: See RCW 74.62.005 . Effective date — 2011 1st sp.s. c 36: See note following RCW 74.62.005 . Findings — Intent — Short title — Effective date — 2010 1st sp.s. c 8: See notes following RCW 74.04.225 .
